properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating the Wright Brothers’ first European flight in public on August 8, 1908, in Paris, France, by Wilbur Wright with Flyer (Type III) biplane; commemorative cancellation stamp dated August 8, 1984 in Paris; includes information on reverse.
